content: third chain of chain 3 round 7 slip_stitch in next 4 double_crochet and in space between the 2 cluster chain 4 5 treble_crochet in same little space slip_stitch into next space between two clusters around slip_stitch into the space with the first cluster fasten_off weave in end ddddrrrraaaawwwwssssttttrrrriiiinnnngggg chain 150 slip_stitch in ea chain weave drawstring into the spaces between clusters in round 6 sew ends of drawstring together to form a loop all done enjoy your convertible bassinet bag this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com
